name: Samantha Taylor
text: Went into this store today looking for two things: a pillow and to possibly re-do the curtains in my home. I had heard that they do custom curtains and I was excited to see their selection. When I asked one of the employees if they do the custom curtains for you, she just said "yes". When I followed up with saying that I was having a hard time finding some curtains for my home that I liked (AKA I would like to look at some options) her response was "oh really". And then nothing further was offered. My assumption when someone is running a business that specializes in custom curtains and decor is to help an interested customer no matter what. I may look young and may not have been dressed in my Sunday's best, but money was no issue when it came to getting what I wanted. I was fully prepared to replace all of the curtains in my home. I will go elsewhere.

name: Rachelle Griffin
text: Very rude I called ask for some fabric and she said I don’t have that don’t know where to get it real rude I just don’t understand people you expect to make money off of business and then your rude to the people that trying to support your business

resp.text: Rachelle, it’s Suzi from The Chameleon. I’m so sorry if I offended you, it was just my frustration at not being able to find headliner fabric anywhere, and I’ve been searching for it for years. We are here to help, and I hate that I don’t even know where to send someone to get it. Good luck in your search!

Kudos for venturing out and providing a much needed service.

name: laura castellano
text: I am so happy with my recent purchase of six custom valances and two accent pillows.  The high quality of the fabric and the custom sewing is amazing.  And to make my shopping experience even more delightful, Tanya, who brings customer service to a whole new level, was a pleasure to work with. I needed some adjustments made to two valances so I contacted Tanya who got back to me within minutes.  The adjustments were made very quickly and all the valances are up on my windows and they look great (p.s. I added the tassels in the photos.)  I've already recommended Best Fabric Store to several friends.  Thank you so much for your high quality fabrics and workmanship.  I'll be coming back again!

resp.text: Thank you! So happy you love everything <3 Tanya

name: Susan Van Sickle
text: I included a note that the pillow I was having made was for the back of my couch, and I wanted it firm, but not overly firm.  What I got was something softer than a bed pillow.  You sink right into it and there is no support at all.They did not follow directions, and it was a big waste of money. They had assured me they would make it as firm as I want it, and they didnt even come close.  They have the same amount of stuffing in the large pillow as they do the small pillows.

resp.text:
Hey Susan,

I'm sorry for the delay ... we have been out of town visiting our son before he went to his new duty station in Germany. I checked into your pillow issue, and found that one of our new seamstresses worked on your pillow and misunderstood how much stuffing goes into the larger pillows, she also apparently did not know to look for notes. We have been so busy since the pandemic we that have had to add several people and this was just a new employee oversight, growing pains, lol. We are going to make you a new pillow and you can just keep that one for a spare. I will reach out to check on the other two pillows you ordered as well ... hopefully they were great. Please forgive the oversight!

Sincerely,
Dann

resp.text: Thank you so much! That's my dad (daddy haha)! Greatest, sweetest man in the world <3 Love that he's loved by many! :) Tanya

name: Julia Thomas
text: This is the best place to buy fabric! I ordered some fabric that I wasn't quite pleased with- sent an email to the company and they answered right away. They offered to reship the fabric at no charge and were so helpful ! Shipping cost is lower than most places and the selection is AMAZING! You have to give this place a try- I'll buy all the fabric I can from these great people. Thanks!!

resp.text: Thank you so much!! Tanya

name: Kerry M
text:
I am very frustrated over this company's lack of communication.  I have emailed and phoned several times in an attempt to place a custom order.  I do not get a return call or email - and the woman I spoke to on the phone yesterday was downright hostile and made no attempt to solve my issue. Clearly, they are not interested in my business!

Dann,

I just read your response and my heart sank.  I did not "threaten" the woman I spoke to with a bad Google review.  This is simply untrue. After several emails that went unanswered regarding custom pillows, I called your business and told the woman who answered the phone that I would appreciate a call or email with a simple response - can your company make four pillows for me - or are you too slammed with new business?  I told her if you all were too busy, no worries.  Just please communicate.  I was taken aback that she did not try to solve my issue, and quite frankly, in my honest opinion, was a little hostile.  A simple, "we are very busy but will get back to you as soon as we can" would have satisfied me.  But instead,  you,  Dann, sent me two very personal and emotional emails.  I'm truly sorry that you chose this route.

resp.text: Unfortunately for both of us, Kerry used the threat of a bad google review to skip over other customers who had already made appointments for custom sewing help, and be taken care of before them. The "woman" Kerry described as "downright hostile" is our sweet customer service rep named Dana and I invite anyone who reads this to call and have a chat with her yourself! I believe what was perceived as hostility was more anxiety from being threatened and was definitely not hostility. As much as a bad review hurts we do not feel that this is fair to our other customers and so here we are. Please take time to read over our many other good reviews as well :)

name: Lesa Hutchens
text: Customer service that is second to none! Good quality products are reasonable prices.

resp.text: Thank you so much! <3

name: Ms. Nico
text: I placed my order on 6/3/2020.  I have inquired several times to it's status.  No one is responding.  I have requested that the order be canceled.  Would not and will not recommend this store to anyone.

resp.text:
Hi,
Have you been responded to yet? There's an alert at the top of every page of our website letting shoppers know of delays in shipping and email replies. Our business is not operating as normal during this time, just like many businesses. Please keep what companies are dealing with during the pandemic in mind before you try to hurt anyone else negatively with a poor review. These are VERY unfair times to be judging a company this way.
Thanks,
Tanya

resp.text: Thank you sew much!

name: Ms. Taylor
text: I’m very disappointed.  I ordered fabric online and once I received it noticed it was too dark in comparison to the portion I want to replace.  I then contact Best Fabric Sore.com to request a return label and was told via e-male the return was at my own expense.  I paid $4.95 for shipping when I ordered the fabric and would have to pay a little over $19.00 to return it using the same shipping method FedEx Express.  I ask the young man at FedEx; why was it so much more than I originally paid for shipping he told me businesses get a discount.  I paid $22.89 for the fabric and would have to pay a little over $19.00 to return it so I would actually get $3.00 back.  Not good business.

resp.text: We're so sorry you're disappointed! While we do receive a shipping discount, I can assure you that we pay well more for shipping than what we charge our customers. We lose shipping $$ on every single order we ship out. We do offer samples so our customers can be sure they're happy with a product prior to purchasing yardage so we do everything in our power to make sure you're satisfied before you have to deal with the hassle of a return. We're in the fabric business, not the shipping business and unfortunately we have no control over shipping charges (we wish we did!!). We consume the majority of all shipping costs on the front end when an order is placed. We simply can't afford to cover the shipping for returns on top of that (because remember, we offer samples). I'm very sorry you find this not good business but we would go out of business if we lost on shipping both ways as well paid our employees for fulfilling the original order and then again for restocking the return that we have less than zero profit in at that point. We are a very honest, veteran and family owned business just trying to stay alive among the big boy chain stores. We are real people here and it actually hurts our feelings and our pride when someone posts negatively about us over things we have nothing at all to do with - like shipping costs that we already lost money on ourselves. I feel that your true issue is the amount that FedEx wanted to charge you for return shipping (and we agree that shipping is outrageous these days, we feel your pain!). So this review is for FedEx shipping charges, not because we have a bad product. I'm sure you didn't mean it to be, but this review is very unfair to us. Hopefully this explanation helps you understand our situation a little better.

name: Wausau Consumer
text:
Horrible customer service and don't honor credit for flawed material.  I've been a customer for many years.  I had received flawed material and was told I could receive a credit or choose a different material.  Since the flaw was not in an obvious spot and the material matched existing curtains I took the credit.  I was NEVER told there was an expiration (30 days) with a credit.  When I wanted to use my credit I was told there is NO record of any credit and there is NOTHING they are willing to do in order to make this right!

Company made no effort to resolve instead resorted to name calling.

resp.text: As our many satisfied customers already know, this review is completely false. We stand behind our products and immediately correct any errors. The order this lady is referring to was placed in April 2015, over 2.5 years ago. She called demanding a credit we had no record of. We asked her how much the credit amount was supposed to be and she didn't know. We needed to research the issue but she wanted to use the credit to place an order that very day so she refused to give us any time to investigate and obviously decided she'd rather bash our honest company instead. She placed 4 other orders with us after the date of the order in question and never once mentioned us owing her a credit during any of those times. We're not sure if she just needed fabric and was out of money or what -- because she didn't allow us to research further. We do everything we can to make our customers happy and had she given us a real chance, we're sure we could have made her happy as well. Also as our customers know, we do not have a 30 day time limit on credits. If we issue a credit, it is available until you redeem it. This lady's story is so off and very misleading so please take a moment to read our many positive reviews about our customer service rather than believing this one. If you click on her profile you'll see for yourself that every review she has written about any company has been negative. Not a single positive review to date. She apparently doesn't have anything good to say about anyone. Very sad. She placed several orders with us that she obviously couldn't complain about so she wrote nothing at all. People who post only negative reviews shouldn't be allowed to ruin an honest company's good name. It's a shame she didn't give us the opportunity to help her. We try so hard to please our customers and would have tried to come to a reasonable solution even though her complaint is from an order back in 2015. -Tanya / President / BestFabricStore.com

name: Karen Landrum
text: I’ve never needed to order draperies before & I was looking in the Yellow Pages & found Western Draperies.  I asked the gentleman who answered the phone if they made block out draperies & he said yes.  The rest was history as Mary came out & made some measurements in my “hot box” bedroom.  I’ve been on my own since I was 21 & moved out of this house ever since.  Mama passed away & she loved lacy valances & mini blinds but it was too hot in this front bedroom.  I moved back in as I knew it would benefit both daddy & I.  But the sun came in fast & furious & I sleep better when it’s dark.  Mary was very personable & definitely knew what she was doing.  My draperies are beautiful!!  And they work so very well w/blocking out that sun that baked me in the early morning.  Her husband was such a nice man & did a wonderful job installing my drapes.  I was like a kid in a candy store!! 👍🏼 💯% satisfied customer!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Karen! We really appreciate the review!

Great... both Mary and Phil are true professionals ... magicians with the fabric.

name: Mike Denton
text:
We were looking for someone to make a half circle window treatment (fanlight approx 3' x 6') for us, but found that no one did that kind of work anymore. It was the look we wanted. We were finally referred to Western Drapery in Homewood. They have a new vender who will make any shape frame you want from a template. After discussing the way fabric would go on the frame with the kind people at Western Drapery, we decided that we could do it ourselves as long as we had the frame. So after carefully measuring and creating the template, it was ordered, made, and shipped. We attached sheer fabric to get the star burst look we wanted to achieve and the end result was perfect. We couldn't have done it without Mary and her brother at Western Drapery and the company that made the form. They were both great to work with.

Mike and Randy Denton

resp.text: Thank you Mike for leaving the great review.  We appreciate your business and hope your window treatment is perfect for you.

text: S&R Sewing Center is the best.  I was having issues with my embroidery machine and Tony offered assistance over the phone.  I tried what he said and ended up taking it into the store.  He resolved my problem in a matter of 10 minutes.  Amazing what a small thread or lint will do to a machine.  Tony was AWESOME in getting my machine working again.  Love that store.  Well worth the 45 minute drive over for excellent service.

name: Sarah Fulks
text: I recently bought a new machine at S & R in Huntsville. They were very helpful, friendly, and patient allowing me to spend as much time as I needed using the floor model before deciding to buy. The machine I bought was on back order, so I wasn’t able to take one home that same day. When the machine did arrive, my husband ended up going to pick it up for me. I gave him a list of extra accessories to buy, but I was a little worried he wouldn’t get it right as he knows NOTHING about sewing. At the store he was able to show them the list, and they went and got everything on the list for him rather than just telling him where to look. I’m definitely happy with the service I’ve received there so far!

text: I had an over 30 year old sewing machine.  I decided to buy a new one.  Ms. Gay was very friendly and helpful and showed me a couple of machines. I love the sewing machine but even more I love that they had a 3 session sewing class that let me get to know my new Baby Lock.  The instructor is very knowledgeable and the class was amazing.  I thoroughly enjoyed this class and will be back for more classes.  I would recommend this store to anyone and everyone.

I went by around lunchtime and upon walking in the door I was approached by a gentleman who knew I needed my accompanying vacuum repaired. I explained my issue. He began to work on it immediately thinking it may just be a belt. Within five minutes I was fixed up and at a very, very reasonable price. I will visit again, and will bring my sewing people with me. Truly exceptional service, with a smile.

This kind of thing happens every time I have used this so called service. They have lost a very good customer. I want to add I was not charged for the last visit ,and I am always treated kindly by the repairman but what good is a machine that comes  back worse than It had arrived.

Please give me a call at 256-536-5696 and ask for Tony so we can see what the problem is since this is the first I've known of a problem. Thank you.

text: Very nice people n they did a great job working on my sewing machine

name: Jeremy R
text:
I stopped in before Christmas to look for a sewing/embroidery machine. Tony (the owner) was very friendly at the time. The next week, we ran across a good deal on a used Brother machine from another local retailer in the area. S&R carries BabyLock which is made by Brother. I needed some accessories so I thought I would give S&R a chance. I called and asked Tony if he had the accessory that I was looking for. He said yes. When I asked the price, he asked where I wound up buying my machine. I told him that I'd found a used machine at a store down the street. His response was "You need to call them" and then HUNG UP THE PHONE.

People buy accessories and notions much more often than machines, therefore I thought that a retailer would be happy to have that business; not S&R.

I like supporting small businesses, especially when they have a service to offer (i.e. repairs, advice, etc.). There are other sewing machine centers in Huntsville that want your business no matter who you are, what you have, or where you got it. I will support them.

Otherwise, I will buy online before I do business with S&R again.

resp.text: We do our very best to give the highest level of customer service to each customer that comes in the door or calls on the phone. but the rest of this story is a little different than what was told. When you purchase a sewing machine from S&R Sewing & Vacuum ctr you do get unlimited support and classes but This however dose not apply to machines not purchased from S&R Sewing I simply told Jeremy R. that after spending more than an hour with him trying to get the best machine for him and his wife that he should go back to where he purchased his machine and they could help with his questions.

name: Compton Owens
text:
We purchased a Miele CX-1 canister vacuum cleaner and could not be more pleased.  The vacuum cleaner is a beast of a machine! Our salesman, Paul Fischer, was very knowledgeable, patient, and NOT at all pushy.  He was very helpful, and even offered to let us take a vacuum cleaner home for a test drive over the weekend.

It am convinced that S&R Sewing and Vacuum Center stands behind the products they sell.  They offer onsite service and repairs as necessary, and that’s a big deal to me. Prices are competitive , and comforting to know that I have a local dealer who cares about their customers after the sale.

I highly recommend S&R!

name: Kim Galkowski
text: I bought a six needle before a Florian I event and was told by Christi I would get the same promo as they had at the event. At the event she did not give me the same promo and when I spoke to her later at the store instead of paying the difference for the cost incurred at the event (that was supposed to be covered) she gave me a store credit requiring me to spend more at the store. Another time I went to another event and ordered a hoop for my machine, Christi ordered the wrong hoop and when I realized it she offered to order me the correct one (this was in early October) approximately 8 months later with all kinds of stories from Christi telling me it was backordered I call the company directly and was told it was never on backorder during that time and if I returned it to the store I could get it directly from them. When I went to the store to return the hoop, bubba found one sitting on the counter that was the correct one, needless to say, I won’t step foot in this store again. Bubba is a good man but I feel that Christi does not care about her customers and lies. I have found another store in town that knows how to treat their customers.

resp.text:
Kim we do not have a Christie that works for us and Buba works for Huntsville Sew and Vac not affiliated with my store I feel that you may have gotten us mistaken for them but if I can help  you with a hoop or anything else please let me know you may call us at 2565365696 also if you don't mind please retract your negative feedback from S&R Sewing and Vacuum Center as it will bring our rating down since we are not at fault.
Thanks Tony Coulson

Each time they explain the problem and have looked for the most economical way to repair the machine. text:
The selection offered here is amazing. Thus the 2 stars.

I am a professional seamstress and have been here repeatedly, due to necessity, and in hopes that the customer service would improve.

The employees that I encounter, display an openly negative attitude. When I'm spending my money, the vibe I get from the place that is collecting my money should not be, " OMG please go away".

I'm the future, my business with Joann fabrics will be done online.

name: Jodie Bilbrey
text: I went in today and wanted to purchase some rotary blades which were all in a locked display. After walking through the entire store, I found a clerk in the back who was placing bolts of fabric back on the shelf. I asked if she could assist me by unlocking the cabinet with the blades so I could buy them. She turned to me and said “ I will after my break” and then she walked behind the fabric counter and picked up more fabric bolts to return to the shelves!  I was so dumbfounded I was speechless. I promptly left the store and found what I needed at Hobby Lobby where they are more polite and helpful to their customers.

name: Lloyd Rafalsky
text:
MY CHURCH BOUGHT 400 PLUS YARDS FROM YOUR STORE IN HOOVER, ALABAMA. THE MANAGER, TONY, COULD NOT HAVE BEEN NICER AND SPENT MANY HOURS DOING THE CUTTING FOR US IN A ROOM THAT WAS NOT WHERE WE HAD TO WAIT IN LINE,,,THIS IS NOT THE FIRST TIME HE  HAS TAKEN HIS TIME TO DO THIS FOR OUR CHURCH AND IS SO NICE TO WORK WITH.... IF THERE WAS A BOLT OF FABRIC WE COULDN'T REACH, HE WOULD GET A LADDER AND CLIMB UP AND GET IT FOR US...HE NEVER COMPLAINED AND WE WERE ALL THERE PROBABLY 5-6 HOURS!
THIS MAN IS KIND AND RESPECTABLE TO HIS WORKERS WHICH IS NOT ALWAYS THE CASE. THERE IS ESPECIALLY ONE WOMAN IN THERE THAT ACTS LIKE IT IS AN IMPOSITION TO WAIT ON YOU  OR CHECK YOU OUT AT THE REGISTER AND DOESN'T SEEM TO KNOW HOW TO TREAT THE CUSTOMER; BUT OVERALL THE GIRLS WORKING THERE ARE GREAT!
MY POSITION IS THAT IF YOU DON'T LIKE PEOPLE AND DON'T WANT TO INTERACT WITH THEM, THEN DON'T WORK IN RETAIL!
I HOPE THE CORPORATE OFFICE WILL GET THIS, AND GIVE TONY THE PRAISE HE DESERVES...HE IS DOING AN EXCELLENT JOB FOR THEM.
I FORGOT TO MENTION ANOTHER DAY LAST WEEK I WAS IN THE STORE MY MYSELF AND BOUGHT TOO MUCH FLEECE TO CARRY  TO MY CAR.
AGAIN, TONY SAID I COULD PULL AROUND TO THE FRONT OF THE STORE AND HE WOULD LOAD IT UP FOR ME...HE VOLUNTEERED THIS WITHOUT ME ASKING!  YOU HAVE A FINE MAN WORKING FOR YOU, AND I HOPE THAT JOANNS APPRECIATES HIM AS MUCH AS WE DO!
THANK YOU,
GAIL RAFALSKY
HOOVER, ALABAMA

Thank you for the sales you have also. I was able to add to an ocean theme in my office to pull everything together.

name: Cher Piette
text: I have gotten into knitting recently and love to buy my yarn at this store. There is a huge selection at great prices. They also have plenty of other craft items plus a framing service. They also have a variety of household knickknacks to stock your home.

name: Privee Sure
text: Long time customer and BIG fan of Hobby Lobby. The employees are cheerful and quick to assist customers, a direct result of quality management. The store is always clean and well stocked. The restrooms have NO HOT WATER. Washing hands in ICE COLD water is terribly painful for some people. They could do a much better job at cleaning the restroom and making sure the trashcans aren't overflowing. The overhead speakers play instrumental music, some of which is depressing and frequently played at funerals. The music seems louder in certain areas of the store which makes communication difficult. Several of the art easels on display have been broken for months. No one seems to know how to operate or adjust the easels.

name: Andrew

text: Went to get a picture framed. They told me they could do it, took my poster; however, THREE weeks later called me and let me know that they not only hadn’t gotten it framed, but that they couldn’t do it. Then I went to pick it up, and they lost my poster. This is a $200 rare poster. A week later they call me to let me know they “found” the poster. I went and got it and they threw away the poster holder and messed up the ends of my poster. Last time I ever go to hobby lobby... horrible business and even worse customer service

text: Shopping at Hobby Lobby is always and enjoyable experience. They currently have everything you could need for Christmas and at an affordable price.

With no aisle labels, narrow passageways, and some aisles blocked off one way in hope of responding to covid somehow?, navigation is treacherous.  People would almost run into me and profusely apologize, and I felt so bad because it really wasn't their fault.

On a more positive note, they have some really cool, specialized paintbrushes.  I might buy some for those special artists in my life.  But online this time!

I was actually here spending my $500 dollars worth of gift card my husband had given me for Valentines Day because up until today this was my favorite store to shop at , I have never been treated that way and this is supposed to be a Christian owned store ! The manager Gene was very polite when I called it to his attention and as I was leaving Kaylee proceeds to tell me have a nice day with a smirky smile !  Signs promoting half off need to be placed better and if someone that works for your company needs to be courteous not rude

text: Was very disappointed with the customer service. I was looking for frames for my paintings. An associate approached me and said it was in their policy that they had to put the pictures into the frames. I explained I didn't feel comfortable with anyone handling my paintings but he was more than welcome to stay in there as I fitted them. After I found my frames at a few more items to pick up. she persisted to follow us around the store untill we checked out. I really got the feeling that we were getting followed around because I thought we were going to steal the frames and I didn't appreciate it at all. I had a deadline to meet so I had to pick up the frames today if not I would have taken my on $200 elsewhere. I will not be back to this hobby lobby if this is how they treat their customers.

From now on, I'll have all my framing done at Michaels on Airport Road.  They have the ability to allow you to see your art in the frame you select on a computer monitor before you order. name: Rachel Gary
text: The store location off of Carl T Jones is nothing short of awful. Granted the store, in and of itself, is in great shape and stocked with plenty of wonderful things, the customer service is pathetic. The staff is excruciatingly rude and I have been dissatisfied with their lack of warmth towards customers on more than one occasion. For this to be a 'Christian store', their employees are nothing short of inhospitable and tactless. To the store, I would recommend putting a smile on your faces and maybe exuding somewhat of a kind attitude when speaking with clients.

name: Jason Zimmermann
text: I went in to exchange an art book that I got for my wife's birthday, as the instructions were beyond her current level.  This was done within just a few days of purchase with receipt.  But, I was informed after some initial confusion of "where's the price" that they could not return/exchange the book because of "copy right issues".  I can guarantee that your store is the ONLY store that I have ever heard of such an issue - and I have worked with copy right items prior.  This is quite sad, as due to this, my wife and myself will not only inform others of the poor return policy (that, mind you, is not posted any where to inform of this possible issue - including your website), but will now take our business elsewhere that is further away, just to ensure that such an issue may never occur again.

name: LeejaClane
text: I've been doing business with them for a few years now and I've always been impressed with they're professionalism, knowledge, and how they treat their customers. Even though I wasn't able to do much sewing for about 18 months, when I went in recently, Debbie still remembered what machine I had and quickly fixed the issue that I was having when I brought in the piece that needed service. I would definitely recommend Stitch Therapy to anyone who enjoys sewing!

name: ctr4smflkresandinnov
text: I'm a big supporter of local quilt shops and this one provides a nice variety of bright colors to choose from. They also offer classes and I signed up for their email newsletter list to find out when those occur. They also sell sewing machines. If I had one suggestion I would say that they need to carry more precuts to fall more in line with the Missouri Star Quilt Company movement that is leading so many people back into quilting
